duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain overall cleanliness and order of all building spaces.
Coordinate office equipment and furniture moves.
Set up community rooms for meetings and special events.
Inspect sites property to correct unsafe conditions.
Handle snow removal and salting in inclement weather.
Coordinate shipping and receiving of medical waste disposal.
Process outgoing mail from various departments within the sites.
Handle after hour emergencies when directed by the Facilities Manager.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent required. Valid, Active driver’s license.
